name: I'm Sorry: The Influencer Apology Sim
name_original: I'm Sorry: The Influencer Apology Sim
description:
I'm Sorry: The Influencer Apology Sim is a simulation game developed by Jim_Mhead. It was originally released in 2021.
You can play I'm Sorry: The Influencer Apology Sim on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
